meanings.sent1: The swashbuckler bravely faced the enemy with his sword drawn.
meanings.sent2: The movie's main character was a fearless swashbuckler who always saved the day.
meanings.sent3: The swashbuckler decided to duel with a rubber chicken instead of a sword for a change.
meanings.sent4: In the world of finance, he was known as the swashbuckler of the stock market, always taking risks.
meanings.sent5: The image of the swashbuckler in his feathered hat and shiny boots was etched in everyone's memory.

meanings.sent1: The young boy imagined himself as a swashbuckler, saving the town from imaginary monsters.
meanings.sent2: The swashbuckler's colorful costume caught everyone's attention as he leaped into action.
meanings.sent3: The swashbuckler's cape got caught on a tree branch, causing him to trip and fall dramatically.
meanings.sent4: She was a swashbuckler in the kitchen, fearlessly experimenting with new recipes.
meanings.sent5: The swashbuckler's daring rescue of the princess became the talk of the kingdom.
